metadata.Title: CVE-2019-12881 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: i915_gem_userptr_get_pages in drivers/gpu/drm/i915/i915_gem_userptr.c inthe Linux kernel 4.15.0 on Ubuntu 18.04.2 allows local users to cause adenial of service (NULL pointer dereference and BUG) or possibly haveunspecified other impact via crafted ioctl calls to /dev/dri/card0.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
